export-entities.name: ACTION/Modify
export-entities.pql:
ID 44 STATUS APPROVED CREATOR "0" ACCESS_POLICY ACCESS_CONTROL PBAC FOR TRUE ON ADMIN BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON APPROVE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON DELETE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON DEPLOY BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON READ BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON WRITE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow ALLOWED_ENTITIES
COMPONENT "ACTION/Modify" = (OPEN OR RUN OR EDIT OR DELETE)
